title: rINa mada dhrta
sahitya:
rINa mada dhrta pAhi harE jagadIshvara shESapurIsha ramEsha 
girIsha surEsha vibhAvya bhUri karuNA vyayOrurasa


anupallavi

  bAN abhuja khaNDana padmanAbha nava vAridAbha paripAlitEbha dhutarOsha lObha jaya


caraNam 1    pApa ghana samIra pAdanata bharaNa rucira karaNa nikhila sharaNAti mOhana 
gOparUpa dhrta divya cApashara jAtarUpa vasanAri bhUpahara
    caraNam 2    sharada vidhumukha cArutara radana vijita madana mrdulapada nAradAdi manO
nivAsa ssIta kAntihAsa paripAta dAsagaNa bhO dharAsahita
    caraNam 3    kAmatAta parama kAnta sama varada rucira sharada cikura vara dAna samAja 
cAruyana surapAla hE naraka sura dAnava sharIra dAnacaNa
